About Me

A short story about Michele...

Biography

Born in Palermo, Italy in 1997. I earned a scientific diploma and a Bachelor's Degree in Computer Science. My graduation dissertation was about tree and graph algorithms on social networks. I developed a good problem solving skills thanks to the knowledge of algorithms and data structures. I work as Java Software Engineer in Capgemini in financial services, mostly for banks and insurance companies. I develop in Java with Spring framework. I use SpringBoot and SpringBatch mostly. I mainly work in microservice architecture and develop web-services and rest API, i also use hibernate, mybatis, oracle sql, docker, kubernetes, etc.. I also work on monolith applications using also JavaScript, Css, Html, JSP. Knowledge of other programming languages: C, C++, Python, MatLab.

You can check my github page for some of my projects.
